txt.en: 'Your deeds have truly impressed me, [placeholder]. I intend to remain here a while longer, as I have some business with the merchants to the north... but you should be heading towards the capital!\n\n'Have you forgotten the bounty we discussed? One of Athelward's men should be able to see to your payment. Travel north along the road into Cliving and seek out Frithelm. Mention that you have assisted the one and only Caddabrand with Athelward's Uruk troubles, and he will see to your share of the reward.'

'Greetings. What brings you to Cliving?

'Caddabrand? That braggart... I wager he convinced you to finish his tasks? The only thing greater than his sense of self-pride is his desire to profit from the labour of others.

'Here is your share... it is doubtless that you deserve it and more.'
With Caddabrand's main goal completed, all that is left to be done is to collect each share of the reward.

Cliving, the capital city of the Norcrofts, lies far to the north, beyond the trader's outpost along the road.\n\nCaddabrand has informed you that your share of the bounty may be collected from the warrior Frithelm, in Cliving.
